description_txt: stated on June 14, 2016 in testimony before a U.S. House committee:

description_txt: stated on June 21, 2016 in remarks in Raleigh, N.C.:
quote_txt: Says Mark Zandi, who wrote a report criticizing Donald Trump’s economic proposals, is "one of Sen. John McCain's former economic advisers."

description_txt: stated on June 21, 2016 in a rally in Columbus, Ohio:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump called pregnant employees "an inconvenience."

description_txt: stated on June 15, 2016 in a senate hearing:
quote_txt: "For every extra year that a girl stays in secondary school, her chance of getting infected with HIV/AIDS decreases by half."

description_txt: stated on June 21, 2016 in a meeting with Christian leaders:
quote_txt: "We don't know anything about Hillary in terms of religion. Now, she's been in the public eye for years and years, and yet there's no — there's nothing out there."

description_txt: stated on June 23, 2016 in remarks at the Better Bike Share conference:
quote_txt: My administration is "well represented both racially, ethnically and gender-wise."

quote_txt: As a result of Roe vs. Wade, "America’s maternal mortality rate dropped dramatically."

description_txt: stated on June 22, 2016 in a speech:
quote_txt: Says Hillary Clinton’s immigration platform would "create totally open borders."

description_txt: stated on June 22, 2016 in a speech:

quote_txt: "The LGBT community is more often the victims of hate crimes than any other recognized group."

quote_txt: The Benghazi victims were "left helpless to die as Hillary Clinton soundly slept in her bed."

footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • June 23, 2016

description_txt: stated on June 20, 2016 in a statement:
quote_txt: "As governor, in the face of partisan attacks, (Charlie Crist) had the courage to save jobs and lead his state into economic recovery."

description_txt: stated on June 13, 2016 in an article:

description_txt: stated on June 22, 2016 in a speech in New York attacking Hillary Clinton:
quote_txt: "For the amount of money Hillary Clinton would like to spend on refugees, we could rebuild every inner city in America."

description_txt: stated on June 18, 2016 in a Phoenix rally:
quote_txt: "Because of Obamacare, you have so many part-time jobs."

quote_txt: "If Question 1 were to pass here in Nevada, we would have more restrictive gun laws here in Nevada dealing with the transfer of firearms than they do in California."

description_txt: stated on June 22, 2016 in a speech:
quote_txt: "I was among the earliest to criticize the rush to war (in Iraq), and yes, even before the war ever started."

quote_txt: On running for re-election to U.S. Senate

description_txt: stated on May 26, 2016 in a fundraising letter:
quote_txt: Says Russ Feingold’s "campaign is powered by small-dollar contributions like ours."
